Reviews:
This is my favorite vape store in Surprise AZ because it's the cheapest! Great service.; I had called about a week ago to inquire about a certain brand and flavors I always use. I was asked a few questions by the man that answered the phone and then he said he would order and have in a few days. He said that new customers get a discount that would make my selections $12 a bottle for 60ml. I went in today and they guy there said none of that was true. He was not rude he was very polite but at 17 a bottle I won’t be going there again since the man I had spoke to had clearly told me a certain price and no one seemed to know what I was talking about.; Amazing service very nice lady that I had spoke to 10/10; Short back story......... I have used e-cigs from 2007, I have always bought my supplies online.  The particular products I use are much harder to find online.

I went into this place to see the latest products in person, I was acknowledged Immediately by Dylan.  He was so patient with me, explaining all the latest products and taking the time to help me find the right es device for me.  I can’t say enough about Dylan and this shop.
I highly recommend this place if you are looking for your Vape needs.  They also have a huge array of Vape juice and CBD.
You will not be disappointed.  The products, knowledge and Great Customer Service are the reasons I will continue to shop here.; By far the worst customer service hands down.  Whomever “helped” me all he said was 1 to 2 word answers, and spoke so quietly I could barely understand his yes and no’s.  Was glad to find a shop closer to my address to save time.  Next time I need any vape juices I’ll definitely drive the extra mile west to another shop.  Bout the only good thing was the price, other than that it’s about it

Reviews:
This was always my place to order. Not sure what’s going on now. Ordered 10 bottles of juice. One was ok to use. The others are dark amber, taste peppery and seem off.
I added a photo of what I usually get and what I was sent.

I emailed twice and no response. Shame, seems a lot of the negative reviews are feeling the drop in service.

Edit. Order #414521; I ordered from them many times in the past! This time I ordered and it has sat there with label created for 5 days now! Reached out and they said the post office has lost package and now they are out of stuff I ordered! I got a full refund! I do understand what everyone says about being able to contact them, it is hard to get them to respond to email timely! They really should have a number you can call; Initially, I had thought that this place was a walk-up store, so I showed up and tried to go inside, but the place is an office, apparently, and it was locked. I contacted customer service about this, and they got back to me, eventually, telling me that they do mail order only, which ends up being okay; I was just hoping to get a deal on a Geek Bar, but I ended up going to another shop in town, where I was able to get a good price on a Geek Bar.; have been ordering from vjd for a couple of years with no problems and great customer service, but things have obviously changed with this company. placed an order from them 8 days ago and received the tracking# the same day. when I track my order, all I get is "acceptance pending". tried numerous times to contact customer service for some help with this issue and to try and find out what the problem is, but no response. used to be a legit company. customer service is a joke! and I am out $100!; I'm dealing with similar issues to VJD's recent reviews. I've ordered from them in the past and the experience was great, but not this time.
I placed an order 9 days ago and received tracking information, and the status hasn't updated since. I reached out to the company and got a response the next day saying it may have been misplaced at the "courier's facility" and that it would be reshipped. About an hour later, I got a message saying part of my order was refunded, but still no tracking updates.
Cut to today (3 days later) and there still hasn't been any movement on the shipment, and my last email remains unresponded to. The shipping reference number they included in their initial response was the same as the first tracking number I had received, which is weird because they said they were reshipping it, so I have no idea what's going on. I've tried calling their local number and still haven't gotten any help.

Reviews: I'm local. Love that I  can pop in and get their products the same day! The employees in phx are awesome. Been using the Mi-pod 2.0+ for 6mo. Best device yet that helped me finally quit smoking! That and the Mad Hatter, I love salts; classic tobacco!; I did business with these people for quite sometime. They don’t stand by their word. They sell expired vapes, and they don’t refund you for what don’t sell like they promise. I’d never do business w them again!; Orders take up to 18 BUSINESS days to arrive. Nowhere on the site was that info relayed. Expectations were definitely changed since I was unaware. I truly believe somewhere on the website it should give the timeline. Having a generic "ship within 48 hours," gives an illusion of receiving products within a week or so.; I bought a MiPod pro at a little shop in Fresno. Cartridges are lasting 3-5 weeks before needing replacement and I'm using 1/6th of the juice I was prior & completely quit tobacco. Horrified that it took so long to find your brand. Love it.  Just wish you shipped to Indiana.; Been ordering for awhile from mipod, but not anymore. My last order I had enough points for a $15 discount so I used it and 24hrs later my order was cancelled so I called to find out why because there was nothing in the email stating why it was cancelled and they said it was a fraudulent purchase and now my points are gone. I tried reordering and the points were gone, they were consistent enough to flag that one as fraudulent as well. Pretty strange that my orders all went through fine when I didn’t use points. All orders were on the same card delivering to the same address. There’s better retailers out there that actually will let you use the points you accrue, I’d suggest looking for them and are quite cheaper.

I have been purchasing much of our hardware from LA Vapor for many years.  They do a great job.  I have had no issue with product missing like I do with many other wholesalers.  They ship out either the same day or next day so packages arrive on time.  I personally deal with BJ and he is quite thorough and takes care of anything we need when we are running low on hardware.  They also carry many items that other wholesalers do not which is great.  These guys are a 5 star all day.  Thanks.; We love LA Vapor! We are in the midwest so shipping usually takes a week. Customer service is awesome. We've only had 1 order from them where the wrong item was sent but they remedied the situation with a solution that we were both pleased with. I didn't have to send back the incorrect item which was awesome. They made the whole process hassle free. If you're looking for a supplier for vape kits and accessories, give them a chance! I noticed they are expanding their inventory to include glass so head shops can benefit from shopping here as well.; Love the products and customer service is always A+. They always got the good deals!; We Love LA Vapor. We Celebrate 5 years in business this month and they've been our Main supplier since our doors opened. Customer service is next to none, they consistently carry the latest and greatest and the at the same time they show support for older devices and coils. They'll Match competition prices but I can Guarantee you wont find better pricing. If your not ordering with LA Vapor you are not doing it right.; Buyer beware!
Normally I don’t write reviews but this is unacceptable. 90% of my order was never shipped, I did not receive any notifications what so ever of it being out of stock, nor did I receive any form of refund. They even charged me for my second order without having the products in stock, and never credited my previous order. It seems like this company just takes your money knowing they don’t have the items in stock.
Never had an issue with Juice Supply Company.

Name: Fallen Forge Vapes
Address: 1346 US-89A, Fredonia, AZ 86022, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM; Sunday: Closed
Address Components: 1346 (street_number); U.S. 89A (route); Fredonia (locality); Coconino County (administrative_area_level_2); Arizona (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 86022 (postal_code)
Reviews:
Cute store with large selection of disposable vapes.  Rather limited selection of juice compared to other places I've been.  The prices were ridiculous, however.  Especially if you are looking for Farm Bill 2018 compliant THC products.  ($90 for a two gram disposable?!?, I'll order from Delta 8 resellers . com and wait a couple days for delivery, thanks.)

Bill was very courteous, offered us a military discount, and then failed to provide said discount.  I am not the type to push an issue, I'll just vote with my dollar better in the future....

I will not return to this location.  Not even once; The inside is clean. The staff are friendly. Selection is pretty small. Especially when it comes to vape coils. Though probably adequate for the area.

The absolute biggest problem is the cost. I've seen a few people mention their great prices and I'm not sure what smoke shops they've been to, but Fallen Forge is waaaay over priced. Smokes shops are expensive in general, and you're going to pay more at Fallen Forge than the majority of other shops. Upwards of 50% more on some items.

If you absolutely need some juice or a disposable, it'll work in a pinch, but if you can, wait until you make a trip elsewhere.

EDIT
As Fallen Forge has gotten more established, their prices have come down a bit, and their selection has improved, and continues to improve. They're doing a great job at improving their business. Though sadly their point system for free disposable vapes has gone away. At no fault of their own, but still a disappointment.; Honestly the nicest staff I've met at any vape shop I've ever been to, and they have a really nice selection of disposables that's constantly growing.; 3000 Puffs for almost $40 and 5000 puffs for basically $45. You can go to any other vape shop in Utah and buy a 3000 puff Hype bar for $15-$20. I advise you just buy a few any time you go through any nearby vape shop, other than Fallen Forge. I was very let down and disappointed. NOT WORTH IT!; Great people working there. Good place to find kratom :) And I'm grateful to have a shop in between the big cities. Appreciated the veterans discount.

Reviews: By far the BEST SMOKE SHOP in the valley!! Hell, probably in all of Arizona! They hit the mark on everything that I am looking for when I go to a smoke shop. Outside of the guys being wonderful, funny and super helpful, the inventory is FANTASTIC!! They always have the newest coolest stuff displayed right out where you are able to actually interact with it and check it out. They don't keep everything behind glass making you feel like a child that can't be trusted with anything in the store. This is one of those stores that is worth going to even if you have to drive miles and pass 20 different stores on the way. It's really that awesome!!; Amazing shop. I went in to ask if they could carry a certain drink shot for me, since I just moved down the street, and they had it a couple days later. Prices are extremely fair and they have a good selection. The brothers are both knowledgeable about everything in the shop and help you with everything. I’ll never go anywhere else!!; Loved this shop. I haven't gone in a while due to family member's death and I've just gone through it but when I went this last time with about 3 months in-between my last visit......to my surprise, He remembered me. That ofcourse makes me feel special and seen. Kind gentlemen and truly do have the cheapest prices in a smoke shop I've seen yet. A little farther from my house but when I'm down that way, I like to make it a point to stop by.; Go see SAM!  The friendliest, most helpful and informed guy around at Surprise Smoke & Vape! The store is spotlessly clean and right next to Subway off Grand and they have a HUGE selection. I always get great flavor recommendations from Sam. I actually stopped going to my regular vape store because I love this one. Better prices, better customer service!; If you’re looking for an awesome smoke shop with a great vibe and really cute pieces, look no further. The two brothers that own this place are both wonderful! I will absolutely be coming back and suggesting this place. Everything is priced very well. The way they have it organized will make your shopping experience that much more enjoyable as well.

Reviews:
They are using an unreliable method of shipping products (GLS)?  The carrier never once attempted to deliver my package and then just signed for it themselves. When I called customer support they said this is a known issue and they have had this happen in the past. Instead of trying to fix the issue, I was fed some line about "Federal laws don't allow us to ship vape related products.". Which is odd because I just recently got vape items from a different site, through the USPS with zero issues.  I was expecting their support to try and with with me, instead I was fed some line of BS about Federal laws. Buy from this company at your own risk.  If I could give my experience 0 stars, I would.; As a new customer, I'm really satisfied! I was googling a disposable vape that I had tried from a local vape store because the kind I wanted was out of stock..and Huff and Puffers (what a great name) popped up. The prices are slightly cheaper than stores near me, I live in Decatur Alabama. The flavors choices are incredible and there are so many different ones to choose from. I picked the 8 that I wanted, paid for them, and in less than a week I had them! From Cali to Bama is a long distance so I knew shipping would take a little bit and that was fine. I was updated by email when they shipped and UPS is faster than regular postal service.
Of course I haven't smoked all 8 yet but the packaging is in pristine condition and the ones I've used so far have been amazing. So I went ahead and ordered 8 more yesterday! I'm really happy I decided to try this place and honestly the name pulled me in along with the great reviews. I hope to be a long time customer and if any issues arise I will be sure to update my review. Thank you Huff and Puffers!; Great service….I have placed a few orders so far. Everything arrived exactly as I ordered and quickly. Customer service is awesome. I had a question and emailed Customer Service at night. I received a response from Tammy first thing the next morning. I am definitely going to continue to order from them.; Awesome experience as a first time customer.
I placed my order Monday and it arrived today (Wednesday) with no issues. Everything was received complete and the customer service I received from Tammy at H&P HQ was top notch and answered all my questions about the delivery.; The first thing I’ll say is I will definitely be a repeat customer, the prices are very good and products are just as good. I was able to get 2 whole VooPoo vapes, 2 juices, and 2 packs of coils for like $6 more than I paid JUST for my previous vape with no coils or juice. The contact from the company providing information on my package was spectacular, and consistent. I was a little bummed about how long it took to get my package but I think that was because of the time of day I ordered it, then to add an additional day UPS had a delay, so I don’t feel I can fault H&P exactly. All in all I feel extremely happy with my purchase and will definitely be making more buys in the future!

Reviews: I think the location is nice and easy to find. For this they get 2 stars. I noticed the selection available is mild-medium always a bummer but anyone can find something to get them by. In this case the staff member actually didn’t offer any assistance or recommendations and maybe I’m one who just doesn’t know that much about vapes or juices I mean are so many to choose from and that’s why he was rude and unprofessional. I would never recommend this location.; Bought a Vaporesso XROS 3 and a pack of cartridges 4 days ago, cartridges burn out within 6 hours when online it says that they should last close to 2 weeks which seller confirmed. Before I bought,  I asked if I can return it if it isn’t working . Seller (made an impression that she is a store owner) said yes and gave me a receipt. Today I came in trying to get a return and she told me that the device is working as designed and that I have to “wait for a couple minutes between the puffs for cotton to absorb liquid” it says nothing about it in directions that came with the unit or in any of the online reviews. I wasn’t abusing a unit I primed cartridges for at least an hour before using it and was taking 2-3 good puffs  every 10-15 minutes. Either she is selling counterfeit Chinese copies  or sold me a bad unit, regardless that was the last time I shopped there. And she didn’t even give me an itemized receipt.; N2's staff is top-notch! They hooked me up with awesome tips to enhance the flavor of my vape, especially the killer blueberry option. This spot is my local go-to for all things vaping. Big shoutout for staying open on Sundays! Super stoked about the speedy service, too. Keep rocking it! 🙌💨; ***STAY AWAY***Came here once. Shop is pretty empty and no prices were listed on anything or any shelf. First red flag Bought a vape. It was $27.00 before tax. The vape stopped working, came back within a week, told him about the issue, was told nothing he can do. Okay fine, well I’d like to by another one. He says okay $38.26. Excuse me, but the price I paid 3 days earlier was $27 before taxes. Now your saying it’s $34.99 before taxes. Was told I was lying, like bro. Just missed out on a good customer, I hate how shiesty shops like this don’t post prices on the shelves before they charge different people different prices. Lost what could have been a reliable customer but to be honest the shop is empty, have a total of 3 different vapes to choose from, horrible flavors with minimal choices. Might as well be running a kiosk cart at a mall; Nice people. The house juices aren't bad... Generally good selection of premiums. Rewards program is pretty nice. They usually have some cool stuff on sale for super cheap.

EV2101282 you have my contact info if needed.; I have had nothing but an amazing experience using Eightcig as my wholesale distribution company for vapes!! This I believe is due to the awesome customer service and follow through of Justin Korf!! Justin does an awesome job of making sure his customers are happy and taken care of!! I will continue to use this company and it’s across the USA!!; Horrible customer service they will lie and say they shipped your order label created dose not mean shipped eightvape and the it can take up to 3 weeks before they ship you have lost my business; Place order on September 20th. Order delivered today September 22nd. Local delivery. Contacted by B2B directly to confirm. Delivered before an order shipped email was sent. I was too lazy to drive 40 minutes to pick it up. The local ship option is worth the extra $3. Also the only shop I know that  actually stocks prohibition brand eliquid. Been wanting those since I moved from New York 3 years ago. Thanks again for the great experience. Will definitely be shopping with you again.; Great service, pricing, and quick delivery.  Johnathan is our new rep and he has been awesome. Never more than a text or call away and always responds quick and takes action.  Their customer appreciation is out of this world. I was able to go in and pick from a bunch of items for absolutely free as part of their recent customer appreciation effort.   Can't say enough good things about them. They are cool.  Highly recommended.

Name: Sweet & Sour Smoke Shop
Address: Ave Agustin Ramos Calero, Bejucos, Isabela 00662, Puerto Rico
Opening Hours: Monday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Tuesday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Wednesday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Thursday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Friday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Saturday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Sunday: 8:00 AM – 7:00 PM
Address Components: Avenue Agustin Ramos Calero (route); Bejucos (locality); Bejucos (administrative_area_level_2); Isabela (administrative_area_level_1); Puerto Rico (country); 00662 (postal_code)
Reviews:
If I could give it zero stars I would. I purchased a vape that turned out to be defective due to it leaking. The young employee did not know how to assist with the assembly or add the flavored e-liquid and video conferenced the owner. I made my purchase and off I was to the beach. While using it, it began to leak so after my visit to the beach I stopped back in and advised the young employee of the vape having a leak issue. I advised I wanted to upgrade because I didn't want to have the same issue. I had the employee test the upgrade and she once again didn't know how to operate/fill the vape so, she once again conferenced called the owner,  she explained the issue with the first vape, then out of nowhere I hear her saying she's coming to the store. The owner and another lady walked in, took the upgraded vape, started treating her employee (who was her sister) very rudely because she didn't according to her fill the vape correctly (mind you she, the owner, was telling her what to do via video chat).  She checked the vape, spoke to me like I was annoying her, makes a very ignorant statement of you can't tip the vape....my response....um lady, you have to slightly tip it to hit it.

Thank goodness before I purchased the upgraded vape I noticed the box was missing the second cartridge. The other vapes were also missing items and according to her they were new. Very rude and unprofessional how she spoke with me, but what was upsetting was her treatment of her employee,
who was her sister. She asked me what the original price for my first purchase was and stormed out the store. No, goodbye, apologies or thank you for your business.

I would suggest training your employees on the items you're selling if you can't be bothered to be at the store. Also, just because it's your sister it doesn't mean she should be humiliated in front of customers.

Buyer beware, check the merchandise very carefully as boxes are not factory sealed upon purchase and are missing items.  All of the Lux vapes were missing the second cartridge, yet they were "new", none were factory sealed, now even the first one I purchased. BTW, none of the vapes had the instructions in the boxes.; The first place I found on the West coast of the island that sells the smokes I'm used to getting stateside. Pay your tribute to the Indian at the door for good luck!; Top of the line at there kinda, very friendly staff and really good price.; Went for a new vape kit and the experience was amazing.; What ever you smoke, they have the EQUIPMENT!😉

Reviews: I had 3 vapes delivered usps, when opening the wrapper seal was popped as if over heat exposure or had been smashed and the vapes where exposed to the elements, when contacting customer support they responded with this, "We will send you a usps prepaid return label as we need them back if in fact what your saying is True." Wow!! I have spent lots of money with this group and second question my integrity. I will not be purchasing from them again. Like really; Purchased two Vape Geek aegis mods. There were two issues with this purchase. One mod was missing the "lock" switch and my coupon code did not go through at time of sale. I contacted CV and let them know what was going on. I received a very quick response and a mailing label to ship the defective mod back. As soon as the shipment was confirmed I was contacted by CV and told they had already shipped the new mod. No waiting for them to receive it, the confirmation was good enough for them. I also received a credit for the missed coupon code very quickly on my card. The customer service here is the best I have ever seen and they are on the top of my list for future purchases. I should also add that their prices and product availability are better than most of their competitors! Canyon; The staff was very friendly and helpful to my needs. The one who helped me was not sales driven, but still informed me of the sale that was currently going on and helped me make a cost-efficient purchase. I even got a coupon to check  out a nearby establishment I'm now interested in trying out. I was very happy with the overall experience and would refer anyone to check them out.; I have placed a couple orders with Vape Central and there was a problem with the first order. They fixed it right away and I was really impressed with how wonderful they were to work with. They responded quickly and kept me updated on resolution. My orders always come faster than expected and I am never disappointed. They always have what I need in stock ( which is why I first ordered from them after being with another company for a long time). They always have some kind of special so I get to try new products . I no longer shop around for vape shops because I get such great service and products from Vape Central. Hands down best place for customer service and quality products.; Discover the epitome of simplicity and taste with Skwezed Disposable Vape and vape central who introduced me to it .Skwezed Vape's precision in flavor crafting shines through in every puff, making their e-liquids a go-to choice for those seeking a true-to-life fruit vaping experience.

Name: AZ Vapes & CBD
Address: 3602 W Bell Rd, Glendale, AZ 85308, USA
Address Components: 3602 (street_number); West Bell Road (route); Deer Valley (neighborhood); Glendale (locality); Maricopa County (administrative_area_level_2); Arizona (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 85308 (postal_code)
Reviews:
Seemed to be a decent store (clean, smelled nice, organized, nicely lit), but was awfully low on inventory and was also simultaneously running a buy one, get one 50% off sale. Not sure if they are clearing room for a large shipment, trying to get rid of older inventory, or getting ready to close down. The inventory was probably older as the CBD cartridges were crystallized, which I was told by the employee was due to the quality of the ingredients (which as far as I know it is not, it is indicative of a cartridge sitting in one place for a while). Other than that statement, the employee didn't seem to be very knowledgeable of anything despite her friendly demeanor. I think she was just a family member filling in as the store was getting ready to close.

Prices seemed on the higher side individually, but so long as the sale is going some savvy purchases would make you come out ahead of other stores' prices. There were some nice binders with prices and inventory listed, something more stores should do for those who just want a quick idea of what's on the menu. I may be back to check out a few of the items when I have time to actually look at the ingredients/brands/etc., but it was closing time and I didn't want to make a snap purchase.; I had a very great experience on my first visit into the store. The guy who helped me was very knowledgeable, and was able to understand exactly what I was looking for. He helped me pick out an inexpensive battery to be used with my homemade cartridges that don't fit any other battery that I have. Also he was able to sell fill carts that fit most 510 threading, unbelievable 👏 everything that I've been looking for! Thankfully I just happened to walk in this store today. Really excited right now, they definitely gained a return customer.; I'm a regular at this shop and they have everything a regular vaper could need! Prices are good, atmosphere is chill, and every employee is super helpful! But the best part is their house juices - incredibly flavorful, more so than many common Brand juices, and some of the lowest prices around! Keep up the good work, guys!; After going through five different shops I finally found the best in the metro area. The staff is really nice and always helpful. They send my juice via mail and it usually gets here within a day of my order. I use the RY-4 6mg juice which is roughly $46.00 for four bottles. It’s a great shop, very simple but they definitely know how to take care of there customers. I would definitely recommend my fellow vaping friends to give them a visit.; One of the best shops i’ve been to. They have affordable and authentic vapes. This is definitely my new go to smoke shop. I 100% recommend this place. The new owner is super nice and friendly, and very helpful. You won’t regret coming here.

Reviews:
Highly Social stands out among the rest, and for good reason! Not only do they have an impressive selection of e-liquids and vaping devices, but they are also one of the only shops that offers samples of various flavors, a "try before you buy" opportunity.

On top of that, if there's a particular item that they don't normally stock, they'll be happy to do a special order, just for you.

Christina, the owner, runs a very tight ship with several employees, but Dani in particular stands out with her. They are both treasure troves of info and good vibes, and I can't see myself going anywhere else anytime soon.; One of my most absolute fav shops ever! So well curated and organized inside. It’s so cute, well designed and has such charm. You can tell a lot of love has been poured into this business and their selection and inventory there is top notch. The staff and owners are the best. I’d give them ten stars if I could ;); Omg this place is awesome. The store was clean, staff was professional,knowledgeable, and got me out of my comfort zone and had me try a new flavor and it is amazing. This will be my official new Vape store since I am new to the area. Thanks so much for everything; Highly social is the best place I have ever been to when it comes to hospitality and esthetics! Beautiful design and excellent employees running the show! If you are ready for an enlightened experience while purchasing your goods I highly recommend going in!; I used to shop at a less expensive shop, (you get what you pay for). I decided to try highly social out since it's much closer to home. My first experience was with the owner who was very friendly and knowledgeable. The juice is a little more expensive but the quality is far superior and the staff is great. Hannah always recommends great flavors and offers samples. They've been my go to store for over a year now.

Reviews:
Vanity Vapor in Goodyear, Arizona, exceeded my expectations with their exceptional service and outstanding products. During my visit, Kendall, one of the staff members, went above and beyond in assisting me to find the perfect CBD topical cream I needed. Their knowledge and expertise were evident, and I truly appreciated the personalized attention I received. Kendall's assistance made my shopping experience smooth and enjoyable.

One of the highlights of Vanity Vapor is undoubtedly their fantastic range of house juices. I had the pleasure of trying out several flavors, and each one was a delightful treat for my taste buds. The variety and quality of their house juices truly set them apart from other vape shops I've visited. Whether you prefer fruity, dessert, or menthol flavors, Vanity Vapor has something to satisfy every vaping enthusiast's palate.

Apart from their excellent customer service and premium house juices, Vanity Vapor's ambiance adds to the overall pleasant atmosphere of the store. The inviting layout and well-organized displays make it easy to browse their extensive selection of products. Whether you are a seasoned vaper or a beginner, the staff at Vanity Vapor are more than willing to assist you in finding the right products tailored to your preferences and needs.

In conclusion, Vanity Vapor in Goodyear, Arizona, is a must-visit for anyone looking for top-notch vaping products and outstanding customer service. Kendall's helpful guidance in finding the perfect CBD topical cream showcased their commitment to customer satisfaction. Combined with their fantastic house juices and inviting store ambiance, Vanity Vapor provides a vaping experience that is truly exceptional.; Great selection of juice and good prices. They have a buy one get one half off sale on Friday, Saturday and Sundays plus a stamp coupon card which you can redeem immediately for a 10ml bottle if you buy 100ml (you get 1 stamp for every 10ml you buy on a 10 stamp card). Today (Friday) I got 2 100ml bottles plus a free 20ml for sound 25 bucks 👍This is the only place I will go to. They carry high concentration nicotine juices (up to 24mg) that aren't salt based. The quality and flavor of their house juices are excellent. Oh and the owner is a very nice lady.; The best vape store in the valley!  I've been to vape shops all around the valley and this one takes the cake.  Incredibly knowledgeable and friendly staff, and super amazing prices.  I consistently walk out of this shop with MORE juice than I would have if I had gone to a Red Star and I typically pay about 55% less than I would at Red Star.   No joke.

Juice is great and the selection is vast.  Every staff member I have met has been very friendly and highly knowledgeable on a wide variety of topics.

I no longer go to any other vape shop in the valley.

PS- I found out today they have a Bitcoin ATM as well.  Go check it out!; Stopped in for your great, buy 1 get one half price. I love you for that great weekend sale. I usually just get Blueberry Extra blueberry. But as I was waiting for my usual juice  I looked  through your recipe book and saw Very Berry. Got 10 ml. Now I wish I would of gotten 100ml.
I love all your employees they are so friendly and I love chatting with each and everyone. Vanity Vape is my juice shop no question.; Great vape store! They have a huge selection of everything, good prices, deals and staff. If you can, go when Paige is working. I have talked with a few different members of the staff the times I have gone there and Paige was beyond helpful, knowledgeable and friendly.

Reviews:
I'm over from the UK visiting family here in Colorado. I usually make my own liquid and just buy some ready made as a treat. So I brought a supply of my home made juice over with me, however we extended our visit for an extra week so I ran short. I went to Elite Vapes where I was impressed by the selection and the friendly, helpful staff. I ended up buying 3 bottles of "near dated" juice - not a problem to me, it'll be used very soon and it saved me 50%. I had been to a couple of other stores before visiting Elite Vapes and as a foreign visitor I have to say I was startled at the high price of juice over here, quite a bit more than I'm used to paying in the UK, also nobody seemed to do any discounts for multiple purchases which is something quite common back home. So yeah, "close out" stock not an issue for me, happy with my purchase, flavours are great and more than anything else just great friendly service in store. I'll be back next time I'm over here. Thank you.; A lot of their stock is old and not usable. I know they carry a ton of flavors but maybe they should drop most of their brands and focus on a few, rather than trying to have every brand and flavor in stock. A lot of it sits and becomes discolored and the quality suffers. I can tell because certain flavors from other shops will be either clear, or have a slight amber color to it, and that same product from elite vapes will be dark yellow or brown in color. The only explanation must be that their stock is old and if you ask to return it after the bottle has been opened they won't accept a return. Some of their staff definitely show disdain for some customers as well, which is always a bummer.; Updated: costumer service has been much better.

It’s nice because they’re close but the prices are high and they never seem to have the nic levels available. There’s always 4-5 people in there but the costumer service always seems contempuos. The please and thank yous are there but it’s like they want you out to finish their conversations. I recommend you know what you want and get out.; Been vaping for over a year now and this is my go to place. Not only because it's close (there's a few more actually closer) but because the people usually make me feel like a friend. I've gotten most of my mods and all my tanks and all my juices from this store. Whenever I have questions, they always answer with honesty and experience.

Online can be cheaper in most instances with devices, but I'd rather support my local shop and I go here instead and pay the extra.; Mitch, Markie, Austin helped me get my batteries re wrapped and taught me about battery safety. The employees are very knowledgeable and friendly. The answered all of my questions with ease.
They have a large selection of juices and many other vape products. they have an area where you can clean your vape and charge your batteries if needed. This will now be my main vape shop.

Reviews:
I just bought a vape here and I thought the box color looked off..after opening I found the vape color to be off as well and it tastes horrible. I’ve heard of people having fakes but I’ve never run into them before. It was also $10 more than I usually pay. $40 down the drain. Insert sad face emoji here.
***update*** I went back in and showed them the difference in the vape colors and he actually gave me a refund….very reluctantly. He was really nice about it so…thank you; Tried to place an order through their website. Went as far as making the purchase. Usually within a couple of days they’ll start processing your order, but them nope nada nothing! I called and sent emails asking about my order and got no response. Called again, nothing. So I had to cancel the order through PayPal because they sure as hell wouldn’t. Why? Why? Have a website? Why? If you’re not gonna process the orders do away with website! That’s just lame! Makes you wonder how many orders are just sitting there and nothing being done about.; Fake Flum!!!! 6k puff tan out in 2 days burnt out and made me feel sick. Compared to my other pebbles and they look different. Also was around $10 more than they normally are. Dangerous and upsetting.; They sell fake Flum Float vapes. I bought two lush ice flums at this store and both had an issue with continuing to burn after I take a hit. After comparing to my roomates vape purchased at a different smoke shop and calling around to  other reliable smoke shops, I came to the conclusion this wasn’t legit. The one I purchased here burnt out in two days and had a copyright insignia while my roomates and the other shops have a trademark. The real ones are also significantly heavier.; I really don’t like giving negative reviews,, especially of small businesses.  However I keep trying to give this place another shot, but literally EVERY time I go in there I get completely ripped off. Everything is behind the counter or in a glass case (as it should be in tobacco shop). I usually have to wait forever to be helped by an employee. They act like they’re knowledgeable, but TWICE now they’ve sold me the wrong product.  Their vape devices are heavily overpriced to begin with, but on one particular occasion, the price tag on the device I was purchasing was mis-labeled with that of a different, much higher priced manufacturer.  I brought it to their attention, and they said yes, it was a mistake… and they proceeded to raise the price even higher by $10.  It was factory sealed, so I couldn’t even look at the actual item inside the box before purchasing it. The employee assured me it was the color/design I described, but only briefly held up the box so I could try and read it myself.  After paying over their inflated price, I got to my car, opened the box, only to discover it wasn’t anything close to what I had asked for. Of course, as most stores do, they have a strict NO REFUND policy on opened items.  That was a waste of $80.
Last week I stopped in there just to get a new cartridge for one of my devices.  Which are all kept behind the counter.  It wasn’t busy in there at all, and I even showed the employee my actual device in which I needed the cartridge for.
Of course, I get home, open it up and discover it’s the WRONG one.
I’m so sick of repeatedly getting ripped off by incompetent employees at that place.
It’s not worth the convenience.  If you drive a couple miles further south down Oceanside blvd, there’s much better vape shops. Most all decent vape shops will actually take the time to show you the device, and even open up the box so you see it BEFORE purchasing it.
If you’re looking for a really great vape shop, I recommend Cloudhaven Vapors on Oceanside Blvd instead.  They have amazing customer service and much better pricing. They always seem to have exactly what I’m looking for in stock, their employees are friendly, knowledgable and always take the time to ensure you’re purchasing the right item.  I’ve always walked out of there happy and it’s definitely worth the extra drive.

Reviews:

His friendly and approachable demeanor put me at ease, and I felt like I was talking to an old friend. And the prices? Unbeatable! I walked out with three times as much stuff as I got from the last place I went to, and at a better price too! If you want to experience vaping the way it was meant to be enjoyed, without breaking the bank, then you absolutely have to go to Vapirice. Trust me, you won't regret it! Scott and the team have earned a customer for life in me, and I can't wait to go back!; Very friendly great selection. They didn't have the glass I needed for my M 100. But the guy did try to help me. And I did end up buying a new tank. That I'm very happy with. This will be the only place I go from now on. I highly recommend this place.; Very personable and helpful staff.  I already decided to make this my "go-to" vape store.; Best smoke shop in the area. They always have my vape flavor and the customer service is on point!; Clean store very professional & knowledge of vapes will definitely be coming back

Address Components: 101 (subpremise); 6740 (street_number); East University Drive (route); Mesa (locality); Maricopa County (administrative_area_level_2); Arizona (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 85205 (postal_code)
Reviews:
Hands down one of the best smoke shops I have ever been to. Upon entering the establishment you can expect to be greeted with a smile. Also, if you frequent this shop often, you will find your usual purchase waiting for you at the register. The workers are personable and very knowledgeable of the merchandise they carry; what ever it is you are looking for they most likely have it but if they don’t they usually have something of equal quality for a great price. Speaking of which, they offer great deals and sometimes promotional offers, and if you are like me and go through vapes fast, they always have sales on select brands in a variety of flavors.

My most recent purchase is the vape in the photo I have provided, 6000 puffs for $8.99. Tastes pretty good and for the cost of what I normally buy which is almost 3 times as much, a part of me feels slightly guilty like I’m ripping them off. 🙀

But seriously, if you’re in the area check them out. You won’t be disappointed.

They also carry drinks and snacks if you’re just passing through.; **UPDATE** If I can put a 0 star rating I would. Had a great conversation with the guy who did my transaction too my mom and I were very chill with him and even laughed at some jokes that were made. I just bought 3 vapes from this store and got 2 of them for free today, NONE OF THEM have flavor in them. IF YOU SEE A SIGN IN THE FRONT OF THE REGISTER THAT SAYS “Find out how to get a free vape :)” DO NOT DO IT. And do NOT fall for the half priced vapes, they are half priced for a reason, waste of time and money. NONE of them have flavor. Disappointed because this was my go to store for 8 years. I do not think I will be coming back ):; Came for our first visit after referred by a friend. The staff are nice and patient when you don’t know what you want. Will be back for more vapes and smoking supplies.; Amazing service and very friendly staff. Great vape selection too. Zane is wonderful.; I really like Waves! They are about 18 minutes from me and I pass by a lot of other shops on the way here. It’s always clean. The staff is knowledgeable and friendly  100% recommend!

Address Components: 1760 (street_number); Calle Loíza (route); Santurce (sublocality_level_1); San Juan (locality); San Juan Moderno (administrative_area_level_3); Santurce (administrative_area_level_2); San Juan (administrative_area_level_1); Puerto Rico (country); 00911 (postal_code)
Reviews: We found this cool vape shop when walking on Calle Loiza since my friend needed some replacement batteries for her medical marijuana cartridge. Henry was great and got my friend her battery and we also were able to purchase some Juicy hemp wraps and gummies. She was happy that they had a good selection of Juul pods. The shop is located near 2 medical marijuana dispensaries so they seem to cater to both vaping and marijuana users. I'm not into vaping but the service was really great and they also had some cool clothing that the owner designed with the same logo. I purchased a really cool army fatigue jacket and saw a couple of cute shirts but unfortunately they didn't have my size available. We hung out for a while listening to music and just chatting with the workers about local food spots to try. Definitely recommend!; The staff are very knowledgeable of all the products they referred me to juicy jay hemp wraps smoked nice and slow even on the beach; Great selection compared to some of the other CBD stores I’ve tried in the area. Henry is always very helpful and makes great suggestions. This is definitely my go-to smoke shop in San Juan.; I was in Calle Loiza, San Juan with my wife for vacation and stopped by to some new hardware and Juices. My current Smok pen was leaking, therefore I decided to upgrade. What caught my eye, about this particular vape shop was the style and environment that it was vibrating within the area.  So I walked in and  the spoke with the owner Carlos, told him about my current vape issue and he recommended the Aegis legend, which is box mod designed to be water and shock resistant. So far I have no issues with its durability. I also tried one of the new juice brands I never tried, and Carlos put me on the Cush Man Mango Strawberry flavor, and it fits my flavor style. My overall, thought on the place is that  here you get great service combined with  super knowledgeable staff and great environment! The spot has almost a Amsterdam cafezique  vibe  and think that one of its selling points. There seating around the store where, you can chat and shoot the breeze with the owner, who is also highly knowledgeable about the area and other hot spots. His recommendations  was on point out side the vaping topics, So I highly recommended dropping by and taking a look at the merchandise.; Rico was the best help and assisted me through the entire process of finding the flavor and style of vape I liked

Reviews:
This shop is beautiful and clean and is ALWAYS stocked!! The staff is awesome  and kind. We highly recommend this place, if you're in Riverside or surrounding areas, stop by. They have what you're looking for lol.; Hands down the best damn smoke shop not even just so cal either, its the best period with no other competitors evwn close! Widest selection of glass, vapes, snacks, and gear. If you cant find something you like here then your obviously blind! The inventory is always rotating which is a good thing and means the business is thriving! Have built a relationship with AJ now and anytime im going to spend more than $20 i spend it here! Has everything dreams are made of and if they dont have it they will get it for you! Also ive never met a smoke shop owner that is as knowledgable about every single product they stock!!!
Thank you AJ and Platinum for taking my thousands of dollars and i dont regret spending even one of them!; this is my new go-to. There's at least one guy there that knows the stuff inside and out (I haven't interacted with anyone else yet so the other employees may know their stuff too) and it didn't feel like he was just trying to dump the most expensive things on me. He asked questions and made sensible recommendations on a tank and salt nic that I was very pleased with. If anyone asks me if there's a smoke/vape shop close by, I will be recommending them to this place.; Hands down the best smoke shop I've ever been to. Very professional knowledgeable crew that will definitely get you the help and product knowledge you seek.
They got great competing prices that helps get customers the beast deals in town. I definitely recommend visiting this place.; Literally 5/5, no 10/5, stars for Platinum. Anything you could imagine and even some stuff you couldn't. But it's AJ, an employee, that really ties the store together. Want to test a bong you're interested in and that terp slurp you want? He'll fill it up with the perfect amount of water to show its function. And lastly, their prices are amazing. For example, Rodeo was selling the new aleaf nectar collector for 120, while Platinum had the same ones for 60 (that's the same price as aleaf sells them for on their site). Do I need to say more?

Customer service is top notch! They listen to your needs and wants and help you decide which path is best for you instead of pressuring you to buying something! Their juices are amazing and exclusive! Been going here for so many years and the experience just keeps getting better and better!; When I first walked in to the shop I was very impressed with the look and feel. I was greeted by the owner Brandon who was extremely helpful and knowledgeable on the subject of vaping and e juices.  Brandon and Ryan assisted me with finding the right liquid for my taste and needs,  and they were both very patient with my picky taste buds.  Just based on their customer service I will continue to go to this store for all my vaping needs.  But that's not where it stops, the store is self transports you to an different Era and really makes you feel comfortable.  Their menu is very extensive, and they know about every juice they have.  Also the menu is leather bound which adds a very nice touch.  They built and designed every part of the decor and that really adds to the experience. I would recommend this shop to anyone who is looking for a place which makes you feel like a friend and not a dollar sign.  Keep up the good work guys!; This place is fantastic. Excellent in stock selection of mods, juices and accessories. Knowledgeable staff is always friendly and willing to help---whether that includes education, finding devices that best fit your needs, or sampling juice varieties.

The online juice bulk sellers have taken over a huge portion of the market space, especially after california's vapor related bans and legislation.

Highly recommend supporting your local vape shop during these turbulent times, and make sure they can continue serving the community in the future. :); MY go to vapor shop. The juices they carry are the best tasting I have found. All the guys are always kind to me and very professional, not to mention very honest. Not the same experience at other " spots". to each their own I guess... but this shop has my support! They don't act cheap (which was mentioned in an earlier comment). They always change my cotton to try stuff on my mod, let me know of sales and have given me freebies too! They go out of their way to help me. love them!; I am blown away by the level of customer service here at Venice Vapor Lab! A friend and I came in on our lunch break looking to pick up some new juices. We were helped by a guy named Lucas, he was really professional and recommended juices to us based off of what we liked. He offered to change my cotton and got me set up with my new juice before I left. Hands down the best service I ever received at a vape spot. Highly recommended!

But yes very chill cute spot !; So, if you’re a tourist and need your vaping devices, juice, or other products, trust me, ONLY go here! I use a voopoo device and only use PnP coils. I literally got there at 11:50 p.m., only 10 minutes before they closed and the guy that helped me was so nice and friendly and they are the only vape store that has tanks and coils! Now I know to ONLY go to this vape store, they have all or most of the products that we have in the states, I was actually amazed! Reviews:
The staff is friendly, professional and very helpful! They have a great selection! Reasonably priced!; Called to ask about a dynavap and when I got there they had one set aside for me.

The clerk behind the counter was super friendly and helpful.

I asked if they had a dynavap to a water pipe adapter and they did not have one in stock, but the clerk figured out a solution by using a dab cup (I think they called it)—the rubber dab cup fit the dynavap and sealed to my bowel really well. great experience

Oh and the prices were great; This is the only place in the Valley I trust as my one stop shop when I need to buy a new vape, pick up pods or buy juice as the staff is always top notch, knowledgeable and friendly and the selection of fine juice as well as sale options is unbeatable! I’ve been a loyal customer since I first switched to vaping back in 2018 and regardless if I’m in Tempe or if I have to wait to fly back Ohio or Vegas I always make sure to stock up at HQ before and after traveling as no place I’ve seen in Arizona, Ohio, Nevada, California or South Carolina has been able to hold a candle to the service, selection and knowledge I’ve come to rely on as an HQ customer!; Literally recommend this place to everyone the people who work here actually care and are so nice and helpful !! the girl with her nails always slaying is so nice and the guy with the glasses is very informative and sweet!!; I was born in Tempe which is rare as only 20% of us remain here. In saying that I am expressing that I've been a customer of this establishment off and on for nearly three decades. I also live on this block.
Three ladies were working tonight. They were employees that I have been served by before. Each time they represented the rudest people I have ever seen employed, not only here, but anywhere near Mill Avenue. I am only slightly aware of the owner but certainly aware enough to know that this is not the type of staff that he usually has working here. I have a substantial level of local notoriety due to my history in the entertainment business over the last 4 decades. I also ran businesses at this intersection for quite some time. I thought I had the worst staff to ever work near Mill Avenue. That record has now been overcome by the staff working at HQ tonight. In the last couple of years I have shifted my business over to Wild Side. There is an incentive in doing that because they keep their vape juice prices below the competitors. What would keep a budget customer coming to HQ, even with higher prices, would be the quality of the staff. I know this more than anyone else in Tempe, because my own talents were what kept customers coming to my businesses even with our higher prices and undependable staff. These three ladies working at HQ tonight, plus one other that was working on the evening of April 20th, are pretty bad. I understand that finding staff to actually do a job is hard enough these past few years. Expecting anyone to actually care about customers is probably asking too much. However, HQ Vape & Smoke has managed to do that over the years until recently.
My hope is that Wild Side will do better with their ordering so I don't have a need to go to HQ anymore. It would be a win-win. Save money and get treated with respect. I'm not sure if the employees at HQ were born here. Considering their age, that is a possibility. However, they would not be old enough to understand that those of us that were born here in the last 50 years and have been here for decades are sick of the poor quality people coming into the area. We are the customers they should make themselves aware of because we are the ones who will be most offended. One needs to keep in mind that it is the people who have been here who have made Tempe the desirable place that it is and that has attracted so many people to want to come live here. The families who have been here throughout the 20th century have worked hard to make Tempe what it has become. There are not many of us left. Those of us that are don't appreciate newcomers or careless modern local youth who participate in making this area undesirable with their attitudes and behaviors. Furthermore, we have an increasing population of foreign students who are not used to the way an average American may act. Like I expressed to Chase bank, we are a multicultural metropolis that requires people who work in service to have skills appropriate for this area and are appropriate people in general to be exposed to that student population.
For no other reason than the simple fact that we worked hard to make this part of Tempe what it is today. We would prefer our efforts not be spoiled by service staff who think they are working in any random shop. This is a historic area with a special culture. It would behoove anyone who works on this block to learn a bit about the area that they also partake of and benefit from living or working in.
If they don't believe in these facts I have stated about how special Tempe is, just have them go ask all the transients outside.
I don't recommend anyone replace their staff, but I will say that if HQ were to lose these employees ... they wouldn't be missed.

As a pennsylvania medical patient, I was told I could get my medicine in Puerto Rico. I was greeted by a security guard who stated that I couldn't get flower, which I knew already. In itself, I highly recommend you go💞.

Absolutely! Red Star Vapor is now my ultimate destination for all my vaping needs. The location is consistently spotless with an incredible atmosphere. Not to mention, their selection is truly amazing, and their customer service is impeccable. And don't you dare forget to sign up for their rewards program!; I really appreciate the effort that the staff takes to make you feel welcome and appreciated.  I would recommend this store more than the one on 51ave. They allow you to test the product before leaving the store to make sure that your product works properly,  highly recommend anyone to make the drive I don’t regret driving far for the customer service; I have dealt with a great deal of smoke shops and most of them are the same cookie cutter set up.  Red Star Vapor is different. Not only do they make great flavors, they will help you to find ones that you loved from somewhere else and have now discontinued.  They will find a flavor that is surprisingly close to your favorite, continuing to satisfy you.  With multiple different strengths, and additives to get your juice just the way you want is a great specialty.  I know because this is what happened to me.
So I call before coming in to make sure my flavor which is high in demand is available and 99% of the time it is.  Red Star Vapor  knows their customers, my shopping habits and usual times I refill, so I can count on them too keep my favorites in stock,   which I greatly appreciate.  They are pleasant, educated, and knowledgeable, making their customers continually happy.  It is nice not to have to call multiple places and /or call and drive all over to find what you want, especially at a great price. I won't go anywhere else as the REWARDS alone are worth every trip.  Loyal and Happy "Forever" Customer.  Elizabeth H.; The Phoenix store has been one of the best stores I've been too. Kat & crew have been absolutely fantastic. Every time im come in, it's like a party woth old friends with the best selection of Vapes, juices and, vape accessories and the perfect amount of harresment.; Wonderful shopping experience! I've been met by Jake the last few visits and he is just fantastic. He recently recommended a new device for me to try and even introduced me to some new flavor options. Thank you again for great service! See ya soon.

Name: The Vape Lab 2
Address: 7205 S Power Rd #104, Queen Creek, AZ 85142, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Tuesday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Wednesday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Thursday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Friday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Saturday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Sunday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM
Address Components: 104 (subpremise); 7205 (street_number); South Power Road (route); Power Ranch (neighborhood); Queen Creek (locality); Maricopa County (administrative_area_level_2); Arizona (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 85142 (postal_code)
Reviews:
This shop use to be my favorite. But within the last couple of months they have changed management and completely changed the inside. Yes they are adding glass and have lots of juices…. But they are also out of so many things. Today I went in and there was one employee who didn’t know anything. She had no clue what pods were what. There were some pods that looked like the ones I used but were labeled differently than what I’ve gotten in the past. I asked if they would work and she said “I don’t know” and shrugged her shoulders. I left with nothing because I was afraid the pod wouldn’t work in my vape. They say they are revamping it. If they are, then they need to close down, get all their stuff in stock that they are going to carry, actually train their new employees properly since they let go of the old employees that actually new the products they were selling, and then open back up. I use to love this shop, but since they changed management and let go of a bunch of employees… I have not had a great experience the last few times I’ve been in.; The staff is awesome! Very friendly and helpful. Prices are decent. They also have a good selection of vapes and juices. Definitely recommend this place!; Clean, large selection, great prices compared to others(ex 2 geek bar pulse x disposable at smoke shop near me cost $66, they charge 2 for $40); THE BEST VAPE SHOP EVER!!
They ALWAYS have the best price for juices (the juice we get is $15.99 here and EVERYWHERE else is at least $23 or more!!) They even started ordering extra of the juice we always get so they have plenty in stock for us every time we go! (We never have to worry about running out or not being able to find it! They always order extra just for us 😊) And all the staff know the different kinds of mods very well so they give great recommendations  (I absolutely love my new geek vape mod with the Zeus tank 💗)
Their rewards program is amazing too, every other time I go I'm able to use my points for additional discounts (like 30% or $10 off) on the already best priced juices 😁
And the best part is they stand by their products, if you unhappy with the mod you got or get a bad atomizer in a pack you can take it back in and they will work with you to replace the items, so you never have to worry about your purchases here!
My hubby and I ONLY go here and will continue to go here forever! (We have been going to this place since we moved to the Queen Creek area about 6 months ago.)
Highly recommend!!
Would give a million stars if I could 🌟; I love this place. The selection is amazing, the Legos are inspiring and the staff is super helpful and friendly. I go out of my way to hit The Vape Lab.

I first learned of this place when I was looking for a seemingly difficult to find glass piece for my vaporizer. Of course, Josh had this piece and for such a cheap price.

Additionally, Josh has a great setup in the back to relax and enjoy some drinks or smoothies. Reviews: Awesome Store really cool employees.Wonderful selection of color-coded stalking and many products dis counts.Come in today and meet people interested in your favorite hobby; I don’t really do this reviews, but this place sticks out. Prices weren’t the highest but they weren’t the best, my biggest complaint is the guy working seemed annoyed that I was in there. For example even though the disposable vapes are back 15 feet behind the counter to where it’s impossible to read what flavors they have, dude made zero effort to tell me what flavors they had or give any type of opinion or suggestions. Overall the customer service was straight garbage. I don’t ask much, and I’m not a high maintenance customer, and you don’t have to act like working the counter at a vape store is your one true calling in life and any other job or career would be a waste of your skill, ambition, drive to achieve greatness and your one true desire; but damn my guy act like you you maybe would like some repeat customers. I know it’s not going to affect your bottom line or make a difference at all, so I’m not saying this like I think me never returning is going to run you out of business, but I definitely will not be returning and I won’t refer any one to this place. Reviews: I am usually very impressed with this company and their customer service but today I was being “helped” by Destiny. She was incredibly rude, unhelpful and made me feel as though I was being rushed out of the store. When my husband was asking questions about a menthol flavor, we were told the brand he was asking about was only sweet and they had no real “minty flavors” and ended the dialogue at that instead of suggesting a better brand. Destiny’s tone was very condescending towards us and quite rude. I am quite disappointed with my customer service today.; Be sure to make sure you get your change rude immature classless cashier gives me change rounded up? When I ask where’s my change she gives an attitude? Total trash bucket of an employee I’d be embarrassed to have her work for my company just a truly pathetic excuse for a position in customer service the owner should be proud but I suspect their one and the same .; Was thinking of going to check out this shop, sorted reviews by most recent. All 1 star, then noticed the way owner responded to a customer because they don't have a common product. If your just another crappy disposable vape shop then change the name or at least mention it in description instead of acting like your unprofessional is the customers fault.; One of their employees decided to add a tip the next day to my transaction. When confronted he apologized and refused to refund. Offered a instore discount lol. I would avoid this place if you can.; Destiny was such an angel, I mean WOW she was absolutely wonderful and such a big help. She is my favorite thing about coming in to the store my addiction comes second to her.

Reviews: They treated me with the greatest respect fantastic deals and backed up their product by replacing broken item and giving me an item that was charged but found in bag.  They always give me a deal on each item.  It might not be alot to some but any amount at all from a business that doesn't know me each time I go there is the only company for me.  If ya want to be treated right and have good choices go see Moe .They are honest and feel like family. They help me shop for my friends and a discount is always available; I love this shop. They have all of your smoke products and accessories, from cigars and pipes to vapes and juices. AJ is very knowledgeable about all of the products he carries. I asked him to make some recommendations based on my preferences and he was right on all of them. I love it!; I am a regular customer to this shop because my physical therapy is next door. I recently had my right leg amputated from the knee down due to a car accident. I have a break in my therapy so I have no way to get to the shop I spoke with A.J. and he said that he would deliver my order himself  when I told him I had no way to get to the bank he made it possible to pay with my debit card.  Just when you think there is little help for the world we are living in someone like A.J. comes along and restores my thinking. If we had more people like him well you know the rest. Customer service like the good old days.; This is a great shop with very friendly staff. There is a very wide variety of products from disposables, mods, pipes, glass, CBD and more. Also if they don't carry exactly what youre looking for (which is unlikely) they will order it for you. Extremely reasonable prices for us frequent flyers and newbies. All is all this is a wonderful shop for all your smoking needs.; I had a wonderful experience at this vape shop. Called in to ask if they sold the Pax 3 vaporizer and was kindly informed that they did, swung by and was given a great deal! Will definitely be returning for any smoke shop needs. 5 stars

Reviews:
It's a fine establishment I have walked in. I ordered a bag of chips and the person actually greeted me and said hello. They have a very peculiar Red Bull that is not on sale at circle k. It is actually really good. I'd recommend this place. I give it a good five stars. I didn't even smoke vape and I still came here just for the hospitality.; Taiga is the place to go!!! They have amazing customer service and care about every single customer walking in the door. They are very knowledgeable, and helped me purchase my first hookah. I would give more than 5 stars if I could!; The variety of products available is impressive, ranging from high-quality glassware and vaporizers to a diverse selection of rolling papers and accessories. They even carry a wide array of CBD products, which was a pleasant surprise.
The staff at taiga smoke shop are incredibly knowledgeable and helpful. They took the time to answer all my questions and provided excellent recommendations based on my preferences. It's clear they are passionate about what they do and genuinely care about their customers.
The prices are reasonable, and they often have great deals and discounts. I was particularly pleased with the quality of the products I purchased; everything exceeded my expectations.; This is my go to SMOKE SHOP no matter the time of day they always take care of me. The owner as well as the employees go above and beyond, to take care of his customers they always offer a free beverage before leaving because he knows we’re going in the hot sun been going  here for over 3years and will be rocking with them till the end. Show them some support and come on in. Best price and huge selection for everyone; Who would’ve thought a smoke shop could provide such a level of hospitality?!?  Prices always match or beat the vast competition and the crew is always welcoming and helpful.  Plus,  nothing better than being offered a bottle of water on a 113 degree summer day!!!

I’ve had tons of questions about different devices and flavors, and they always take the time to walk me through everything without making me feel rushed.

The selection here is top-notch—there’s always something new to try, and I love that they’ve got a good mix of premium juices and affordable options. Plus, they’re really good about recommending flavors based on what you already like, so you don’t waste money on stuff you might not enjoy.

Every time I walk in, they make me feel like a regular (even though I’m probably not in as often as I should be). Overall, great vibes, great products, and great people. Name: Vape Central Chandler
Address: 2015 N Dobson Rd, Chandler, AZ 85224, USA
Address Components: 2015 (street_number); North Dobson Road (route); Chandler (locality); Maricopa County (administrative_area_level_2); Arizona (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 85224 (postal_code)
Reviews: Friendly staff, very helpful. Decent selection, only issue is they don't manage their stock well. The e-juice I always get is never in stock. That is the only reason I stopped shopping there. As soon as they correct that, I'll start going again.; Came here with my fiance to get her first vape. Heard that this store was good for newbies. However, we were rushed and were not guided through on how to do anything. He helped us hook up everything up, but I wish he had gone slow enough or directly showed us how to change the coil, add juice, or open it up for cleaning. Maybe a handout with the info would be helpful. We'll probably need to stop into another smoke/vape shop once the coil burns out to learn how to do that.; Plenty of juice, great selection actually! Good prices and awesome coupons if you subscribe with them. I just wish they had more hardware and rebuildable materials, then I would definitely throw 2 more stars up!; As someone new to vaping, I went in with my Cool Fire 4 and was looking for some advice and probably juice/accessories. Unfortunately the guy working there was either stoned, mentally challenged or completely apathetic.  As I was trying to pry any nugget of useful information from him, he lazily grunted barely understandable non-answers. Very quickly I realized the place was not for me or anyone else new to the vaping game. It's too bad because its a cool little shop. I'll continue my search for good customer service elsewhere.; It's worth driving the 20mile round trip from Ahwatukee for me! I've tried many many shops and had mostly bad experiences with a lot of the other shops here in Chandler, poor customer service (as someone who works in customer service myself I understand and appreciate it very much and it's my main deciding factor when it comes to deciding who gets my business), many local places have a terrible selection of juices and sell only sketchy basic liquids for insane prices, and many local shops don't even know much about vaping and setups. I've had NONE of these problems with VC Chandler!! They're always friendly & helpful, they have HUGE variety of juices of all kinds, they have every juice available to sample at the bar (on nice tanks too so you can get a feel for it before buying). A great selection of devices to choose from, starter kits to custom mods, RDAs, RTAs, tanks, atomizers, and accessories.I also appreciate them using 5 Star Rewards system to accumulate reward points to use for free gear. Part of why I love this shop is because they have a discount juice-bucket always stocked with a decent assortment of random juices, sizes, and strengths (30ml are $10 or 2 for $18, and 15ml are only $6 for 1bottle $10 for 2 & $13 for 3!!) so if money is a bit tight you'll still be able to vape happily without sacrificing quality!! Vape Central is the 6th shop I've visited in Chandler and it's definitely the only one for me now. Very nice upscale interior with leather couches, great product presentation, and a very nice bar to use while sampling flavors!! Hands down the BEST shop around!!

Reviews:
I have to share the bad experience that 2 patients had with the budtender Jerleine. Unfortunately, since it was their first time attending this place, they indicated that due to the poor treatment they would not return. Upon entering, the lady found herself with a hostile attitude. She indicated that they could not assist her, because she did not bring her printed documentation. However, I emphasize that in other dispensaries I have never had any type of inconvenience due to this. The license is currently up to date. The annoyance is the way this budtender treated her. Likewise, she treated another patient who was on par with her in the same way. It should be noted that the people who attend these places are PATIENTS, and deserve the same respect as everyone. when receiving help in in-hospital facilities. It is unfortunate that at this point we continue to encounter people who are not fit to work with a public that suffers from various conditions and is only seeking treatment.

I want to highlight that they told him to stop by the premises again later. The question is, what would it change? Why didn't they guide these patients as they deserved?

We are talking about a medicinal resource, not a 'clandestine' place

I hope you can guide your staff better. I'm sure that's not the first impression they wanted to give. Excellent day.; Bad experience on the phone call, it seems that the girl did not have patience and hung up the call.; I love the service I go from Hatillo because from day one they answered all my questions and gave me phenomenal guidance from the staff with a lot of love and attention and with a variety of products. Excellently trained and prepared staff. 10000% recommended; The store with the best selection of flowers on the island!!

Nothing typical, everything studied to the millimeter to obtain the best flowers of the moment.

They guide you very well and the treatment cannot be better.

My favorite dispensary!; A different dispensary, with different people, with true commitment, and it shows! I live far from the area but I gladly came to Rexville because it is well worth it. 5 stars.
