Name: Liquid Nicotine Wholesalers | Liquid Nicotine, Nicotine Salts, Synthetic Nicotine
Address: 1606 E University Dr # 108, Phoenix, AZ 85034, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM; Tuesday: 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM; Wednesday: 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM; Thursday: 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM; Friday: 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM; Saturday: Closed; Sunday: Closed
Address Components: # 108 (subpremise); 1606 (street_number); East University Drive (route); Interstate Business Center (neighborhood); Phoenix (locality); Maricopa County (administrative_area_level_2); Arizona (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 85034 (postal_code)
Reviews:
I've ordered from them online before a few months ago and I recieved my order without issue and a day early! I was placing an order today and when I got to the shipping section it said that I had to pick it up. There wasn't an option to have it shipped accept for commercial shipping. Which obviously isn't going to work. After finding the address and their hours of operation I decided I'd try calling to see if I placed my order today would I be able to pick it up before they closed or would I have to wait til Monday because their closed on the weekend. I regrettably didn't get the guys name so I talked to but he said to go ahead and head on over and that he'd wait for me to get there. The drive only took about 20 minutes which wasnt bad at all. The building is just your average non descript warehouse. At first I went around back but soon realized my error and drove back around front. I parked right out front and went inside. I was met by a couple gentlemen whom greeted me politely. It was incredibly clean inside the office. I told the guy my name and just as I did a lady comes walking into the office from the warehouse holding a small box. It was my order. After getting a copy of my driver's license I asked a couple of which questions and was very satisfied with the answers I received. I'm now sitting in my car parked outside their business writing this. I, of course, opened my box to ensure everything was correct and of course it was. Everything was wrapped up and packaged very carefully and neatly!

If you've read this far my point from all of this is that this place is freakin awesome! He could have told me I'd have to wait to pick my order up on Monday but he didn't. My order was less than $25 so no big deal. But they made me feel like my patronage was important. Thats missing from alot of companies these days. So if your looking for salt nic or regular e juice this is the place to go. I also want to mention that they were the only supplier I could find that sold unflavored nic salt juice in standard consumer sizes. LNW has a customer for life!; EDIT: Since I left the review they reached out to me numerous times and explained the issue. When they updated their website /changed servers none of the recipes migrated over. They have since fixed it, all of my recipes (and I hope others) have returned. They were slow to respond initially but once they realized what was going on they definitely made it right and apologized profusely.

My initial review:
"DO NOT USE THIS WEBSITE!!!! They delete any negative reviews on their webpage. I have been using this website for five years to create and store ejuice recipes. They just DELETED ALL of the recipes without warning. Their response when I created a ticket was "Sorry for the inconvenience, it doesn't look like there is a way to retrieve your recipes. Have a good day!" They obviously do NOT care about their customers. Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere for products and to store your recipes."; I had order from here twice the first time they where super fast order on Friday morning and got my package on Monday. I was a kinda put off that shipping was around 14 bucks but I wasn't to worried since it was fast. The second time was not the case. I order the same time then the first package Friday morning. I didn't get a response tell Monday Night and now the package is going take a week to get here. I also decided to place an order with another company on Sunday and shipping was only 4 dollars. There package left sooner then this one and will be to me sooner. I am kinda bummed cause I was really starting to like this place but now I won't shop here anymore.; I have been working with this supplier for 7 months now and they continue to impress me. Always very helpful and knowledgeable on the phone. There is no process time! My order is sent out the same day I order! Order shows up clean and clear with a certificate of analysis on every order. Outstanding company if you manufacture your own E-juice!; A sorry company to deal with. Will not send you a full order but have no problem with sending you a partial while charging you an outrageous shipping charge. Does not offer their customers a choice on whether or not you want a partial shipment or not. Just bad business. I'll never use them or recommended then again. Search the net. There are plenty of other retailers around the same prices as LNW. Some a little higher, some a little lower. Now how can they claim to be "Wholesalers" when other "Retailers" are the same price? Crooks and liers in my opinion. Just beware if you choose to do business with these people.

I was very shocked to walk into such a large smoke shop. Everything that you could ever possibly want from a smoke shop, they have it here. Highly recommended!!!; I don’t know much about the store to be honest. This review isn’t for the store. THIS REVIEW IS FOR LIZ.

Liz is an angel. People like her can seriously change a bad person’s day, and I really hope she knows that. She is always willing to help, no matter how crazy I am. Every time I leave the store with an interaction with her, I feel a little better. That’s saying a lot right now for. Thank you, Liz.

Magic, please treat her with the utmost respect. Please forgive any mistakes she may make and highly reward her merits. Do not take Liz for granted. She is a special one.; Nick, Victoria and Landon are the best smoke shop employees you can ask for. They make sure the product you get is quality and not only that, if you're a consistent customer they'll check on how you’re doing.
This shop is great! .; Management has to get pricing inline with reality and competition. 10% higher than their immediate competitors for the item I was looking for, 20% higher than the manufacturers price.

If you are selling for a higher price than the manufacturer, you’re doing it wrong. With the hundreds of shops in the valley, there is no point going to one that is ripping off its customers.

I was able to go elsewhere and find what I need for the proper price. Magic lost out on hundreds of dollars from my purchase that their competitor who price matched got.; Liz and Amanda were so friendly and helpful!! Wonderful employees who knew their stuff. Reviews:
I absolutely love this place! All the staff/owner are super awesome and always be hooking me up lol. Very good pricing to and also have a sweet reward program. I enjoy every visit I make (almost daily); Absolutely LOVR this store and it's employees. I've been going here loyally for several years now since it popped up in a Google search while in the valley visiting family and now that I'm living here full time it's always my go to for ally salt Nic vaping and Kratom needs.

I take Kratom for back pain and nootropic benefits and this store always carries a wide selection of powders, capsules, and concentrates and they always keep their stock up to date, and if a product is being promoted you often get a deal on the price.

All their vaping products are always stocked well and varied.

If you need anything specific just ask, they're always willing to give out of their way to carry a product or flavor or whatever you need, especially for loyal customers they will always go above and beyond.

Angie is the Sweetest most professional, polite, and helpful woman ever, and she is always on top of whatever you need.

Frederick is an Amazing guy. Always had the best sense of honor, and will genuinely look after you and take the time to get exactly what you're stopping in for, noatter how far he has to dig, or research, he will even call the owner or off duty employees and if he can't get you an answer or solution right then, he will take down your info and honestly follow through and do it what it takes to earn your business.

Vape shops are a dime a dozen, but quality, honest, and helpful small businesses like this one, that are staffed by genuinely helpful, kind, and wonderful people are much rarer to find, so look no further than ValeLand.

Couldn't say enough good about this store and the people there.

Also, almost forgot. They have an awesome loyalty rewards system, of youre a salt nic user you'll earn free pods or coils, and if you use disposables you'll get a percentage off when you buy two or more. Just another way they give back to their customers.; I love this place! Specially being the only store in this part of the valley selling the only menthol juice I love! Awesome staff and never ending variety of products!; Very helpful staff and good selection. When my device broke and I was out of state the owner mailed one to me! She has done this for me twice! I won’t buy my juice anywhere else! This is a great place!; Great place! Owner is very knowledgeable and kind and helpful. The prices and selection are great as well. If I didn’t live out of state, I would go there every time.

Reviews:
My brother Sam took care of me just like I was hoping for. When he had no glass replacement for my SMOK TFV16 he made sure to find one for me that would work. It’s the place to go & my dowg got a really good deal on a little dabber. 💯🤙🏽Good looking out SAM!! Coming from CALIFORNIA MUCH ❤️💨; This store exhibits questionable business practices that may lead to customer dissatisfaction and potential overcharging. During my initial visit, I was enticed by a seemingly generous offer from a salesperson (Geo) who appeared attentive and helpful, promising a 15% discount on merchandise. I selected an item priced at $49.99, but upon giving it as a gift, discovered a significant and unattractive imperfection on it, resembling damage or melting.

When I attempted to return the flawed item, I was informed that the store has a strict no-refund policy, only allowing exchanges for items of equal or greater value, with the latter requiring an additional payment despite earlier promises of discounts. Specifically, I was offered a 25% discount on a more expensive item as part of this exchange, yet upon completing the transaction, I found that no discount had been applied, resulting in me paying the full price for the replacement.

This experience highlights a lack of transparency and fairness in the store's pricing and return policies. The discrepancy between the promised discount and the actual billing, coupled with the no-refund policy applied even in cases of defective merchandise, suggests a business model that may prioritize profit over customer satisfaction and trust.

Furthermore, the discovery of a similar product at a significantly lower price elsewhere underscores the potential for overpricing at this establishment. This incident suggests that consumers should approach transactions with this business cautiously, armed with the understanding that the advertised offers and policies may not be as beneficial to the customer as they appear. It is advisable for shoppers to seek alternative venues where pricing is transparent, customer policies are fair, and the integrity of the merchandise is guaranteed, to ensure a more satisfactory and trustworthy shopping experience. I personally will not be shopping here ever again.; Great place. Everyone is so friendly and helpful. Great prices; By far the coolest smoke shop on this side of town! Reviews:
Gave these guys a try because their website said they have my peach pear juice head. I ordered 4 bottles of peach pear on 01/08/23. Didn't get it I til 01/19/23 from some obscure delivery service. Although it showed up. it was the wrong stuff. When I called to ask what happened the guy's phone was in and out. Couldn't understand him. Be careful ordering from them.  I asked for a refund and am returning the items. Let's see how long it takes to get the refund, stay tuned.🤦🏻‍♀️; 1 star due to the fact that they didn't have my order ready when they sent an email saying it was. They also didn't have the items I ordered so I had to make a compromise and get whatever else they had. Customer service wasn't the best, I had mentioned when someone orders something they expect to get what they order. The man behind the counter simply told me the person picking the order wasn't all there in the head. That didn't really make anything better, in fact it made things seem more unprofessional. So I don't need to spend money here again and wanted to warn others to think twice if they are thinking about going to this shop. You might get the same treatment. Also when I got home I noticed one of the bottles was past the expiration date with a broken seal. I should have checked harder but just wanted to get my stuff and go. That's not right no matter how you put it.; I put in an online order last Thursday for some juice which normally retails in the $30 range which they had for $5. My package shipped within what I would consider a reasonable time for a smaller outfit (Tues/Wed). I received everything in good order Saturday, with a hand written apology for the delay in shipping and an extra tube of juice gratis.

I'll definitely order from them again in the future.; What a place to shop at, and they carry CHLZ Nicotine Pouches 🔥🔥 A must see; City of Vape has been excellent. When I couldn't get any company online to send e-juice to Michigan because of our ban, they helped me get American Made Solace Bold Tobacco which was allowed by law. Since the ban was released, they helped with an order of Solace Creamy Tobacco my favorite and sent me 3 extra Solace e-juices for free. Great customer service.

Address Components: 5 (subpremise); 2820 (street_number); South Alma School Road (route); Chandler (locality); Maricopa County (administrative_area_level_2); Arizona (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 85286 (postal_code)
Reviews:
I stopped in to get what I consider a relatively odd product. A Zero nicotine disposable Vap. Robert at the counter was very helpful, there selection was far superior to any shop I’ve seen in the area and I was grateful for that. Great customer service, great pricing and an easy transaction. Will definitely be back; IMPORTANT THINGS TO KNOW: every Sunday is buy one get one on all their house blends.
30ml is $7.99. 60ml is $13.99. 120ml is $18.99.
You can pick between glass or plastic when you order the 60 or 120ml bottles.
I wish there was a way to give them more than 5 stars. The customer service is beyond amazing. You can sample any flavor before you buy it. The last “name brand” juice I bought was $28.00 for 60mils. Here I bought 2 30mil bottles for a grand total of $15.00 due to Veterans Day sale and I couldn’t be happier. Nearly half the cost and double the taste. There’s a wide selection of flavors he can mix for you or you can ask him to mix a couple to make your own. All of the juices are aged for two weeks before he even puts them out on the shelf so you don’t have to worry about any weird flavors. He can add any amount of nicotine you want. If you’re not happy with how the flavor came out and have at least 3/4 of the bottle left then you can take it in and he’ll add whatever flavor it’s lacking. The mods and starter kits are closer to online prices than any other place I’ve been to. The list of good things goes on and on. If you’re tired of every boring vape shop that’s filled with the same people and overpriced products and want something different then this is the place for you.; Best shop in Chandler. Amazing customer service and prices and Can’t be be beat in quality.  Robert was amazing. 10/10 recommend.; I went in the shop about a week ago to purchase a new vape and the gentleman that was helping me was very short with me and was not knowledgeable on what he was selling. He was a heavier guy with a beard and glasses looked to be late 20s/ early 30s. After asking him about 3 questions he started being rude and short tempered. After getting my device he sat down and someone else had to come help me pick out my juice and coils, It was not a good experience and I will not be coming back.; Really friendly and knowledgeable staff. They always go above and beyond to make sure I get what I need, even to the point of ordering a mod for me that they no longer carried. This is the only vape shop I go to now!

Reviews:
I went there on vacation and was amazed by the variety of the vapes they had. Great store good prices and awesome customer service; Bought a Geek Bar Vape, and told the employee if I can test it in store as I’ve had a few out of the many that I’ve bought elsewhere, be defective and stay on when not using. All other shops kindly take it back and swap it out for a proper working one. The employee here said “yes, we make sure everything works properly.”

First vape pull and the device stayed on. I told them that it is not supposed to continue to stay on after you finished taking a pull.

They said the device was not defective and that it is supposed to work like that.

A vape should not continue firing when there is no air draw. The 3 employees that helped out and saw the issue do not know anything about vapes and how they work and refused to exchange it.

Now, I have a vape that is staying on, burning the coil and draining my battery long after taking a hit/pull. I can’t even turn it off because it stays on, or when I turn it on, it sometimes starts firing without taking a pull.

Will not come back or recommend anyone here.; Went there a couple of hours ago and the service was very very bad. We were attended by the most unwelcoming employee i’ve ever met. He made no effort in finding a product for us. Definitely not returning there.; Bought a 5000 puff vape. Lasted 1 week. Called the manufacturer and they told me to call the store to change it. Called store and they wouldn’t do a thing. $44 for NOTHING. Don’t buy from them; I went there to leave a resume and the retail associate trashed my resume. She was so obvious, i told her to call the manager,  she had a conversation on the phone that lasted for seconds. Then, I insisted to call him again but this time to test her. She was like: yes, yes, yes. Then she said to leave the resume to her. I should have turned and not left the resume.

This Bodega stole our credit card. We have a party of ten and two went there. We got our card charged to Cowboy Plus for .10 and Google for 1.00. The next day we had 300 charged to  Deciem USA LLC, a parent to skincare Ordinary. Luckily our credit card notified us.  We confronted the store clerk who called the “owner”. We called the police as well and the hotel. This is not the first time the 50-ish year old store clerk has done this. The same person was there and wasn’t shocked. Avoid this place like the plague. There is a Supermercado about 5 min Uber drive and well worth it.

Disappointed in this place, since the vast majority of people are @hiltoncaribe guests.; Very great service I stayed in the area for the weekend at Condado village,  I visited the bodega and met Ms. Mady she was very sweet and kind. We have been sampling different places for strong Puerto Rican coffee  and this did not disappoint; It was delicious. For two yummy small cafe con leches we paid around $5.50. We will return next time we are back on the island.; Best Pina Coladas in town 👌 skip the hotel bar and catch a drink here!; Good selection, easy to find. Probably have what you need and then some.

Reviews:
Farma Verde Marijuana Dispensary: Unbeatable Deals and Exceptional Quality

If you're in search of the ultimate cannabis shopping experience, look no further than Farma Verde Marijuana Dispensary. With its unbeatable deals and exceptional quality, this dispensary has solidified its reputation as a top destination for cannabis enthusiasts.

One of the standout features of Farma Verde is their commitment to providing the best deals in town. Whether you're a seasoned connoisseur or a first-time buyer, you'll find their prices to be highly competitive. The dispensary frequently runs promotions and discounts on a wide range of products, from flower and concentrates to edibles and topicals. These deals ensure that customers can explore a variety of options without breaking the bank.

What truly sets Farma Verde apart is their dedication to quality. They partner with reputable local growers who employ sustainable cultivation practices, resulting in premium-grade cannabis products. The dispensary meticulously selects their inventory to offer an extensive selection of strains with varying potencies and effects. Whether you're seeking relaxation, creativity, or pain relief, their knowledgeable staff will guide you towards the perfect product to suit your needs.

The shopping experience at Farma Verde is unparalleled. The dispensary boasts a modern and welcoming atmosphere, with clean and well-organized displays that make browsing a pleasure. The staff members are not only friendly and approachable but also highly educated about the products they offer. They are always ready to answer questions, provide recommendations, and ensure that customers have a comfortable and informed buying experience.

In addition to their excellent prices and quality products, Farma Verde goes the extra mile by prioritizing customer satisfaction. They offer a hassle-free return policy, should you encounter any issues with your purchase. The dispensary also values customer feedback and continuously strives to improve their offerings based on customer preferences and suggestions.

Farma Verde Marijuana Dispensary truly stands out as a go-to destination for cannabis enthusiasts. With unbeatable deals, exceptional quality, a welcoming atmosphere, and a commitment to customer satisfaction, they have earned their stellar reputation. Whether you're a seasoned cannabis connoisseur or a curious beginner, Farma Verde is the place to go for a truly exceptional cannabis shopping experience.; Excellent service. Good variety of strains and products. Terpene information by strain available readily on the strain menu. Ample parking, big and spacious inside. Well followed COVID-19 regulations. Waiting area had chairs well spaced out observing social distancing.

Update: Still great; Friendly and knowledgeable staff  great service; Very nice and friendly service.; They are awesome

Reviews:
Perfect place to get my vape needs! Super friendly and knowledgeable.; Never actually there.... the guy who runs it has like NO character, and the prices are kinda steep....

Update: Decided to give this place another shot, and sure enough, he wanted to mandate me on the laws of buying things for my son! I have my TABC and know ma laws!! State of Texas I can purchase Tobacco and Alcohol products FOR MA SON if I so choose to do so!!; Store and staff are great. They don't open until noon, which on weekdays before work make it impossible to get a new vape until the end of the day. Not ideal. Prices run a little high compared to most places I've been. But with no other source for vapes out here they can charge almost anything they want.; As far as their product selection goes, it's great. The staff was also pretty good. The product (in terms of the disposable 2000 puff vapes) that I used was awful. The battery life dies before you run out of juice leaving me with like a 1/4 of the cartridge left. I feel like I got ripped off because it happened with all 4 that I had purchased. For the price I paid for them, I would kind of expect the battery to outlive the juice. I would say I got unlucky but it happened 4 times. Don't forget about how much they get clogged too. Hope this helps someone in the future.; I brought my broken vape into the store 48hrs after switching from cigarettes. The gentleman that assisted me was so patient and kind. He wanted to troubleshoot the vape and figure out the problem before he sent me on my way with something that may or may not work. I was able to test his solution in the store and it worked perfectly! Prices were extremely affordable with a large selection of products. Still cigarette-free and was thankful for Traci’s Vapor Emporium all the way home. Having a store close to Fort Stockton is a definite lung saver!

Name: Vape City
Address: 1818 W Pioneer Pkwy, Arlington, TX 76013, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: Open 24 hours; Tuesday: Open 24 hours; Wednesday: Open 24 hours; Thursday: Open 24 hours; Friday: Open 24 hours; Saturday: Open 24 hours; Sunday: Open 24 hours
Address Components: 1818 (street_number); West Pioneer Parkway (route); West Arlington (neighborhood); Arlington (locality); Tarrant County (administrative_area_level_2); Texas (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 76013 (postal_code); 6105 (postal_code_suffix)
Reviews:
HORRIBLE! HORRIBLE! HORRIBLE!

Where has customer service gone ?  Not that I actually expect good customer service from a place run by teenagers. But I was told I had 30 days to return the product I purchased if  I had any issues with the product.  So, I am here 25 days later to return this device because I am not happy with the way it worked.  Courtney was the one I made contact with when I actually purchased the device and she happen to be their when I came to return it. She was great! It was another individual whom I could not see, only hear, that threw his/her defensive and non-knowledgeable opinion out to quickly deny my return.  He/she asked if it worked. Puzzled, I looked at Courtney who was helping me and I answered back to the unknown voice, that it still powered on, but it just did not work correctly, and I was unhappy with the product.  He/she was quick to reply back that the product has to be defective and not power-on for the store to take it back.
Confused and irritated I explained that that’s is not what I was told when I purchased the product. Otherwise, I would’ve not even wasted my time coming up there to exchange it.  Both employees looked at each other, as if trying to read each other‘s thoughts on the matter and how to proceed.
He/she had the brilliant idea to ask their boss.  Which was going to be my next idea as well except that when.he/she made the call, he/she walked out of earshot through the back of the store and appeared back outside the front door.  Making sure I heard nothing of their conversation.  I can’t even be sure a Manager or boss was even called. He/she walked through the front door with the answer of NO. That the store could not help me. I already knew the answer the second he/she walked through the back on the phone, clearly making sure that only its version of the story was told.
Ultimately, in the end, the store lost me as a customer and the potential sale of another device.  Because, even though I was being denied the exchange, I was still considering purchasing something else.
If I was treated better and was sincerely listened to by an actual person with decision making power, Vape City could have kept a customer and avoided this NEGATIVE REVIEW.; They don’t honor their customer rewards or agreements I spent a lot of money here and go out of my way just to shop here their five star rewards isn’t worth the space on my phone if they won’t honor it. I tired redeeming my points on the same product I purchased to accumulate my points.; Cedric and Santana were both very helpful with the products I was interested in.  I had an issue with a device and they were quick to fix the issue and have me on my way. The store stands behind their products and I could not be happier with the service. Prices are fair and the selection process s great.  I will tell my friends, and return many times.

Wanted to add an update. I have been there a couple times since then, and Ashley and Tatiana have upheld the excellent reputation of this store.  Thank you for the suggestions!; The Geek Bar vapes are $32 just for one which is absolutely ridiculous. If you want to be successful then offer products less than any competition or at least match the average price for a Geek Bar.; Best place in arlington to get your smoke products which is comparatively cheaper than any other store. Plus its open 24/7, which makes it more awesome. Also, they got some good people working there who provides the best customer service. Overall, great place, everything was so organized and clean & tidy. Would love to shop again in the future.

Name: The Zebra's Head House Of Glass
Address: 101 E Southwest Pkwy, Lewisville, TX 75067, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Sunday: 12:00 – 8:00 PM
Address Components: 101 (street_number); East Southwest Parkway (route); Lewisville (locality); Denton County (administrative_area_level_2); Texas (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 75067 (postal_code); 8752 (postal_code_suffix)
Reviews: Not sure if it was an off day but I came in the shop a few weeks back on a Sunday around mid day. There was a lady and a gentleman with longer hair working. Upon walking in the gentleman seemed a bit upset by how he looked at my friends and I. We all got the vibe something stressful had just happened. The lady was busy with another customer, so it was up to the gentleman to help us out. I came in for an 18mm AC and to view the cool glass in the shop. Told him about that and asked a few questions. His answers to my questions were quick and simple which at first I was understanding of due to my belief that something serious had happened. I asked to view the 18mm ACs to which he showed me the case. He said the top row was all 18mm. Saw one I liked and asked him to grab it and confirm it was 18mm. He grabbed it quickly and handed it to me asking if I wanted anything else. Turns out he grabbed a 14mm one which I didn’t catch and ended up purchasing. What really disappointed me was while he was checking me out, the lady who had finished with her customer began profusely apologizing to him about a missed order. I had thought it was an important glass delivery, but as they kept talking it turned out to just be a food delivery order. Dude was that stressed about his lunch that he barely helped my friends and I while giving me the wrong product. Gotta chill out man you work in a glass shop.; Extremely friendly staff, which is super helpful because I get nervous entering smoke stores, especially alone! I am new to edibles but the staff was able to recommend me some I fell in love with, like the Trippy-‘Os! If you take edibles and hate the weed-like aftertaste, these are perfect because they taste like regular Oreos, trust. Thank you so much for the helpful tips and for not making me feel clueless, haha!; At first, I went to this store based off a recommendation and was nervous to go in by myself. However the staff was incredibly friendly and the process of buying from them was smooth!; Becca the new girl was such a sweetheart and really made my experience special! Not to mention all of the products are absolutely amazing!; Been in the store a few times. They are always very helpful and have a lot of knowledge of their products. Bought a really nice piece the other day, and came back today for some add ons, couldn't be happier!!!

**Hands down, the best smoke shop in Dallas!**

Gas Pipe has everything you could possibly need, whether you’re a seasoned smoker or just getting started. The selection is incredible, from high-quality glass pieces to an impressive array of accessories. The staff is super knowledgeable and always willing to help you find exactly what you’re looking for. They take the time to answer all your questions and make sure you leave the store satisfied.

The atmosphere is welcoming and relaxed, making it a great spot to browse without feeling rushed. Plus, their prices are reasonable, and they often have sales that make it even better. If you're in Dallas and need a reliable smoke shop with top-notch products and exceptional service, Gas Pipe is the place to go!

Reviews:
Frontiers Cannabis in Carolina is fantastic! The energy in the shop is great, and the service is awesome. The staff always takes the time to educate me on what products best suit my needs, and the quality of their buds is top-notch. Highly recommend!; Jesus, the best  bud tender excellent service i feel great.; Excellent service with great product knowledge to help me with my PTSD!
They also have reasonable prices.; Beautiful day brutal 🇵🇷🎉🧨✊🥰; This dispensary has the best prices and overall selection of products. The customer service is great, very nice people and knowledgeable, you can find the top shelf brands for gummies, flower and vape. I have applied on this location for tourist permit multiple times and on my last visit for the residency license.  The process of the application is smooth but monitoring the progress is up to you to get this done on a timely manner. The first time I applied for the tourist permit took about 7 hours to get it done, 2nd time took 2-3 days. Resident medical cannabis took 3+ weeks. Your best situation is to ask for the phone number of the doctors they used so you can call them directly to check the status of the application.

If you have medical cannabis license from the states you can buy edibles or concentrates. If you don’t want to wait for the tourist visa and want to taste something like flowers buy some Kief or the Portobello kush vape.

Reviews: Unbelievable experience! Went in on a Wednesday with very little knowledge about vapes (to try to get off cigarettes). The store is very clean and bright and does not smell like all the other vapes stores (if you know what I mean).Very organized and professional store and employees. Not intimidating at all. I didn’t know anything walking into the store and a very helpful employee (I forgot to get their name) educated me on what i was buying and what would be best for me. I never write reviews but i’m so happy with my purchase and the amazing customer service I received. Will definitely be back!; Best vape shop in Ocean county. Everytime I go here, there is always a really good sale I can never pass up. Stop buying those garbage disposables and give this a try. The juices they have are so good and smooth unlike disposables like lava which have an overwhelming horrible taste.; Love your false advertising claiming " Stop smoking and start vaping" feel sorry for the nice patrons who believe that LINE! Vaping  has nicotine in it! And chemicals is most likely worse than cigarettes because of the synthetic scents! And  I do have a personal gripe with vape sales and deadly false advertising as I Iost my sweet  mother who started vaping at 75  she was a life long cig smoker but started vaping 5 years ago and suffered a hemorrhagic stroke and a slow brain bleed that left her paralyzed! It was the worst tragedy for our family. And seeing what vaping and cigarettes did to her was heart wrenching. She was more addicted to her vape and  never put it away unlike her cigarette pack. Terrible that you put out this  false narrative that vaping isn't smoking because It definitely is! Sadly no body care$ though unless it's there parent lying in the coffin.; This store provides a wide section of vaping hardware and Geekvape Sonder Q is my favourite!

Reviews:
This dispensary has every type of oil cartridges available for the patient. I bought a Best Buds live resin cart yesterday, and let me tell you that's gonna be my cart of choice in the future.

My only caveat is to CHECK the packages that have no window or no feeling if there is a cart inside; right inside the store after purchase to avoid any awkward situations.

Will come back later after two months.; Called for service over the phone and was greeted by a man named ALFREDO. Took him a minute to juggle the phone around and finally figure out how to use it and finally says hello while coughing and chilocking on go knows what. He was very rude to say the least, kept calling me gentlemen with a sarcastic undertone over and over even after i asked him to stop calling me that. I was simply asking to speak with a supervisor which he also denied me that right. After asking for his last name so I could make a formal complaint he also denied me that right.

Bwell has some of the worst customer service i have ever experienced. Complete lack of respect and disregard for proper etiquette when it comes to dealing with people. I was simply calling to correct information that was not properly entered. After giving me the incorrect information he proceeded to transfer me to the dispensary, and then hung up on me. After I called back he said he could no longer transfer me and hung up without saying goodbye or giving me the chance to say anything else.
